values: 靴子；长筒靴；短靴；行李箱（尤指汽车后部的）；启动（程序）；（计算机）引导程序；
启动（计算机系统）；猛踢；将…赶离；解雇；驱逐；锁车轮（防止违章停车的车辆移动）；赶走；引导（系统进入操作状态）；装入操作系统

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 踢（boot的过去式和过去分词）；使穿靴
无用的；无益的；无利可图的；没穿鞋的
非法制造；秘密得到（bootleg的ing形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 新兵营, 新人训练营
远足靴；徒步旅行靴；登山靴
(用作附带评述)而且, 另外, 除此之外

word_group.phrase: the boot is on the other foot

word_group.brief_definition: 狠狠踢上一脚；残忍地对待某人
船体的水线部；水线间船壳部

bilingual.source: He lost his boot in the swamp.
bilingual.target: 他在沼泽地里丢了一只靴子。

bilingual.source: He pulled a dagger from his boot.
bilingual.target: 他从靴子里抽出一把匕首。

bilingual.source: He pulled out a dagger from his boot.
bilingual.target: 他从靴子里拔出了一把匕首。

bilingual.source: She bought a new boot for the winter season.
bilingual.target: 她为冬季买了一双新靴子。

bilingual.source: The boot was covered in mud after the hike.
bilingual.target: 远足之后，靴子上满是泥巴。

bilingual.source: He put on his boot before heading out into the snow.
bilingual.target: 他在出门去雪地之前穿上了他的靴子。
我把它藏进了她的靴子里。

bilingual.source: One day she met a green boot.
bilingual.target: 一天，她碰到了一只绿色的靴子。

list.abstract: BOOT是英文Build－Own－Operate－Transfer的缩写。即建设一拥有一运营一移交。这种方式明确了BOT方式的所有权，项目公司在特许期内既有经营权又有所有权。是BOT方式的具体表现形式的一种。
boot，英语单词，名词、动词，作名词时意为“靴子；踢；汽车行李箱；解雇；车轮夹锁；再者”。作动词时意为“踢；启动；在车轮上装制动装置；解雇；（使）穿靴；锁住（非法停车的轮子）”。

yingyinNormal.en: I say. Look at those big boot prints. And there's more of the same boot prints on our roof.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们看！好大的靴子脚印啊！我们的屋顶也有相同的脚印！

yingyinNormal.en: Do you think I work at some kind of boot pricing company?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你以为我是在帮靴子订价的公司上班吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I say. Look at those big boot prints. And there's more of the same boot prints on our roof. You see. It's true. I saw Father Christmas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们看！好大的靴子脚印啊！我们的屋顶也有相同的脚印！看吧，是真的。我见到圣诞老人。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't run. I can't hike. And you know what? This boot is fantastic. What do you want to do today, Maya?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我又不能跑，不能远足，而且你们知道吗？这只靴子绝了。你今天有什么想做的吗，玛雅？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, then fine. I have this boot on. I am hobbled. As a person who is hobbled, all I can do is talk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，说就说。我穿着这只靴子呢，走路一瘸一拐的，作为一个腿脚不方便的人，我也就只能说说话了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, guys, the great technology debate. Let's boot it up!
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了各位，关于科技的大辩论，我们开始吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Except the boot. The boot was mean. Never mind how, he's dying to tell us that. I want to know why?
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了后备箱。把我放后备箱里太过分了！别管怎么做的了，他巴不得要告诉我们呢。我想知道为什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Take whatever you want! Just don't hurt me! A parking boot? Why do I have a parking boot on? What's going on here? Please!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想要什么都给你，不要伤害我。轮胎锁？为什么我的轮胎被锁上了，发生了什么事？

yingyinNormal.en: Did you just boot my stroller? Nicholas Wilde, you are under arrest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把我的婴儿车锁住了吗？尼古拉斯·王尔德，你被捕了。

yingyinNormal.en: We have no quarrel with your people. And an ant has no quarrel with a boot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们和你们无冤无仇。蚂蚁和你的鞋也无冤无仇。

yingyinNormal.en: And it's codswallop to boot. Dirty blood. Why, there isn't a wizard alive today that's not half-blood or less.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那简直是一派胡言。肮脏血统。现在世上的巫师，多多少少都有一点混血。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: I'm gonna overrule, but be ready for a great Monty Python-sized boot coming down on your head, Mr. Lester, if you stray too far afield.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我将驳回，但如果你太偏离主题的话，莱斯特先生，就要小心了，别搬起石头砸自己的脚。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I'd love to see the rest of the town! So if you could just open the gate, take this boot off, you and me, we go cruising, check out the local scene.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说真的，我很想去看看其它地方，所以你把门打开，解开我的锁，我们两个一起去逛逛吧看看附近的好景点。

yingyinNormal.en: I discovered it after spending six months slogging through a Bornean rain forest, while my wife was back home shacking up with a two bit ornithologist who lives on a sailboat and likes to wear boot cut jeans!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在婆罗洲的热带雨林里长途跋涉了六个月才发现了它，而我妻子却在家跟个穷酸的鸟类学家同居了，那人住在艘帆船上，还喜欢穿牛仔喇叭裤！

yingyinNormal.en: The identity of the next President of these United States is once again in the hands of a bunch of self-serving, money-hungry, boot-licking, power-seeking politicians who can be seduced or sucker punched or blackmailed into submission.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国总统的宝座花落谁家决定权再次落到了这一帮自私自利，嗜财如命，阿谀谄媚，贪恋权势的政治家手里或者要挟就能让他们服从。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The Flatiron School, where people pay to learn programming, started as one of the many coding <highlight>boot</highlight> camps
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们付费学习编程的Flatiron School，最初是众多编程训练营之一。

sense_info_list.en: a type of shoe that covers the whole foot and the lower part of the leg

sense_info_list.en: a type of shoe that covers the whole foot and the lower part of the leg

examination_example.sentence: In 1892, The Gentlewoman's Book of Sport described a woman swimming in a heavy dress, <highlight>boots</highlight>, hat, gloves and carrying an umbrella.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1892年，《贵妇人运动手册》描述了一位女士穿着厚重的连衣裙、靴子、帽子、手套，手持雨伞游泳（的情景）。

examination_example.sentence: The most critical skills will be developed before the project even starts, in the form of <highlight>boot</highlight> camps.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最关键的技能将在项目开始前以新兵训练营的形式培养出来。

examination_example.sentence: He removed the beyond from the <highlight>boot</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他把后备箱的隔挡卸下来。

examination_example.sentence: Thousands of bees left a town after landing on the back of a car when their queen got stuck in its <highlight>boot</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于蜂王卡在汽车后备箱里，成千上万只蜜蜂降落在这辆汽车后面，跟着离开了这个小镇。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 远足靴；徒步旅行靴；登山靴

examination_example.sentence: Just wear a pair of hiking <highlight>boots</highlight> and a smile on your face.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只需要穿上一双登山靴，并且面带微笑。

examination_example.sentence: On Mars you might see people who wear special <highlight>boots</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在火星上，你可能会看到穿特制靴子的人。

examination_example.sentence: The farmers wear paper <highlight>boots</highlight> to keep their feet warm in the snow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 农民穿上纸靴在雪地里给脚取暖。
